#!/bin/bash
# ---------------------------------------------------------------- #
#                                                                  #
#  Example shell script for Exabyte.io platform.                   #
#                                                                  #
#  Will be used as follows:                                        #
#                                                                  #
#    1. shebang line is read from the first line above             #
#    2. based on shebang one of the shell types is selected:       #
#       - /bin/bash                                                #
#       - /bin/csh                                                 #
#       - /bin/tclsh                                               #
#       - /bin/tcsh                                                #
#       - /bin/zsh                                                 #
#    3. runtime directory for this calculation is created          #
#    4. the content of the script is executed                      #
#                                                                  #
#  Adjust the content below to include your code.                  #
#                                                                  #
# ---------------------------------------------------------------- #

echo "Hello world!"
input.name: hello_world.sh
